author: jucasaca
msg: Some documets in producto folder translated into Spanish

author: gstein
msg: Create a new response handler that expects an empty body, but will
parse any body for an error, if present. The done flag and error will
be stored in the handler, rather than a seperate context (a
is exactly the same as multistatus_only except the latter
*expects* a body to exist. may combine later.
(return_response_err): drop SERVER_ERR argument. we'll grab it
(handle_checkout): defer to expect_empty_body() to gather status,
headers, and errors. examine HANDLER->DONE for completion.
(post_response_handler): rename arg to SCRATCH_POOL. defer to
(open_root): drop POST_CTX localvar. adjust setup of PRC. switch to
context_run_one(). adjust activity creation to use
(delete_entry): switch to expect_empty_body and run_one. don't
bother with the now-missing PROGRESS.DONE in DELETE_CTX. adjust
(add_directory): forget ADD_DIR_CTX. switch to expect_empty_body and
run_one. adjust error checks to use HANDLER->SERVER_ERROR.
(add_file): forget HEAD_CTX. switch to expect_empty_body and run_one.
(close_file): drop COPY_CTX. switch to expect_empty_body and
run_one. adjust call to return_response_err. (a couple times each)
